Class WordApp

java.lang.Object
WordApp
public class WordApp extends Object
This class is the main controller of the game; it controls I/O from player as well as initialization and termination of the game. This class also sets up the main GUI.

  • Method Details

    • setupGUI

      public static void setupGUI​(int frameX, int frameY, int yLimit)
      Sets up the main frame of the GUI
      Parameters:
      frameX - preferred width
      frameY - preferred height
      yLimit - zone where words are eliminated

    • getDictFromFile

      public static String[] getDictFromFile​(String filename)
      Reads file into WordDictionary
      Parameters:
      filename - name of file containing words
      Returns:
      array of Strings, which are the lines of the file

    • endGame

      public static void endGame​(String message)
      Ends current game, showing the player a message and allowing them to restart or quit
      Parameters:
      message - message to be displayed to player

    • endGamePanel

      public static JPanel endGamePanel​(String message)
      Panel which is displayed when game ends
      Parameters:
      message - message to be displayed to player
      Returns:
      a JPanel with an icon and message

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Calls the WordManager.resetT() method of WordManager for all threads, and resets score

    • getCurrentWord

      public static String getCurrentWord()
      Gets the currentWord that has been entered by the user
      Returns:
      current word entered by the user

    • clearCurrentWord

      public static void clearCurrentWord()
      Resets the currentWord that has been entered by the user

    • toggleAppearance

      public static void toggleAppearance()
      Toggles light and dark mode for this application, setting background and text on relevant comps

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Main method of this class (and game). It reads in command line parameters and initializes the WordRecord array as well as the threads managing them
      Parameters:
      args - command line parameters
